docs.snippet: A federal grand jury indicted on Thursday a former Calpers board member on charges of bribing a chief executive of the California public pension fund and faking documents to gain million of dollars in investments fees....

headline.main: Former Calpers Board Member Charged With Bribery in Corruption Case
headline.print_headline: Former Calpers Board Member Charged With Bribery in Corruption Case

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal grand jury indicted on Thursday a former Calpers board member on charges of bribing a chief executive of the California public pension fund and faking documents to gain million of dollars in investments fees.

docs.snippet: In “Deepsea Challenge 3D,” James Cameron dives into a documentary project that’s autobiographical....

headline.main: Voyage to the Actual Bottom of the Sea
headline.print_headline: Voyage to the Actual Bottom of the Sea
headline.seo: James Cameron Takes Viewers on ‘Deepsea Challenge 3D’

docs.abstract: Jeannette Catsoulis reviews film Deepsea Challenge 3D, directed by John Bruno, Andrew Wight and Ray Quint and featuring James Cameron.
docs.lead_paragraph: In “Deepsea Challenge 3D,” James Cameron dives into a documentary project that’s autobiographical.

docs.snippet: Kenyan President Uhuru Kenyatta, in Washington this week to court Western investors, has sought to downplay a spate of violent attacks tied to militants in neighboring Somalia and their impact on Kenya's economy....

headline.main: Kenya Downplays Security Risks as It Courts U.S. Investment
headline.print_headline: Kenya Downplays Security Risks as It Courts U.S. Investment

docs.lead_paragraph: Kenyan President Uhuru Kenyatta, in Washington this week to court Western investors, has sought to downplay a spate of violent attacks tied to militants in neighboring Somalia and their impact on Kenya's economy.

docs.snippet: Homer Bailey pitched seven innings to end his losing streak against Cleveland, and Billy Hamilton had an RBI triple and scored a run Thursday night, leading the Cincinnati Reds to a 4-0 victory over the intrastate rival Indians....
docs.lead_paragraph: Homer Bailey pitched seven innings to end his losing streak against Cleveland, and Billy Hamilton had an RBI triple and scored a run Thursday night, leading the Cincinnati Reds to a 4-0 victory over the intrastate rival Indians.

docs.snippet: “About Alex,” in which college friends reunite, features allusions to “The Big Chill,” a reunion film of another generation....

headline.seo: In ‘About Alex,’ Distorted Echoes of ‘The Big Chill’

docs.abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews film About Alex, directed by Jesse Zwick.
docs.lead_paragraph: “About Alex,” in which college friends reunite, features allusions to “The Big Chill,” a reunion film of another generation.

docs.snippet: Malaysia's state investment company said Friday it plans to make Malaysia Airlines fully government owned, removing it from the country's stock exchange before carrying out an overhaul of the carrier that is reeling from double disasters....

headline.main: Malaysia Plans Overhaul of National Airline
headline.print_headline: Malaysia Plans Overhaul of National Airline

docs.lead_paragraph: Malaysia's state investment company said Friday it plans to make Malaysia Airlines fully government owned, removing it from the country's stock exchange before carrying out an overhaul of the carrier that is reeling from double disasters.

docs.snippet: Cheap credit, lower tax bills and a desire for revenue, more than economic optimism, may be behind this year’s surge in corporate acquisitions....

headline.main: Stampede of Mergers Could Mean Growth, or Irrationality, Ahead

byline.original: By PETER EAVIS and DAVID GELLES

docs.abstract: Cheap credit, lower tax bills and a desire for revenue, more than economic optimism, may be behind this year’s surge in corporate acquisitions.

docs.snippet: U.S. Sen. Lamar Alexander has defeated his tea party-backed challenger, state Rep. Joe Carr, in Tennessee's Republican primary....

headline.main: US Sen. Alexander Fends Off Tea Party in Tenn.
headline.print_headline: US Sen. Alexander Fends Off Tea Party in Tenn.

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Sen. Lamar Alexander has defeated his tea party-backed challenger, state Rep. Joe Carr, in Tennessee's Republican primary.

docs.snippet: Guatemalan police have detained seven alleged migrant smugglers who were part of a network that reached to the Mexico-U.S. border....

headline.main: Guatemala Police Nab 7 Alleged Migrant Smugglers
headline.print_headline: Guatemala Police Nab 7 Alleged Migrant Smugglers

docs.lead_paragraph: Guatemalan police have detained seven alleged migrant smugglers who were part of a network that reached to the Mexico-U.S. border.

docs.snippet: Katie Ledecky beat defending champion Missy Franklin to win the 200-meter freestyle in a showdown of teen swimming queens Thursday night at the U.S. national championships. Franklin returned 75 minutes later to win the 200 backstroke....

headline.main: Ledecky Beats Franklin in 200 Free at US Nationals
headline.print_headline: Ledecky Beats Franklin in 200 Free at US Nationals

docs.lead_paragraph: Katie Ledecky beat defending champion Missy Franklin to win the 200-meter freestyle in a showdown of teen swimming queens Thursday night at the U.S. national championships. Franklin returned 75 minutes later to win the 200 backstroke.
